wikipedia_page.main: Squadron Leader Simon Brailsford was Equerry to Her Majesty The Queen 1998–2001. He was a career Royal Air Force officer, specialising as a navigator. He was promoted to Squadron Leader 1 January 1997, and was later promoted to Wing Commander and Group Captain.

response: | 1998–2001 || Squadron Leader Simon Brailsford, MVO || Royal Air Force ||
